column2: Red squad, we will get vengeance for blue and green!
I definitely think they're getting closer, now that you mention it chap.
I've got just the thing to handle them!
They are approching at a rather rapid velocity.
I see another explosion down the way.
Can't help those poor bastards now.
We still have each other here.
Let's move- I don't want to become organ paste.
I- I don't think we can anymore---

column1: –––> Go to Jelly Bomb Wrecks Your Shit
